text: The 1945–46 UCLA Bruins men's basketball team represented the University of California, Los Angeles during the 1945–46 NCAA basketball season and were members of the Pacific Coast Conference. Led by seventh-year head coach Wilbur Johns, the Bruins were 8–16 overall and were third in the PCC southern division with a record of 5–7. ==Previous season== The Bruins finished the regular season with a record of 12–12 and won the PCC southern division for the first time with a record of 3–1. ==Roster== ==Schedule== |- !colspan=9 style=|Regular Season Source ==References== Category:UCLA Bruins men's basketball seasons Ucla UCLA Bruins Basketball UCLA Bruins Basketball
title: 1945–46 UCLA Bruins men's basketball team
